description: Fullstack TypeScript framework for building ChatGPT Apps with type safety, React hooks, and HMR
rules: Use TypeScript for full type safety with Skybridge
Leverage Skybridge's end-to-end type inference from server to widget
Use React hooks from skybridge/web (e.g., useToolInfo, useCallTool, useWidgetState) instead of raw window.openai APIs
Use Zod schemas for input validation in widget registration
Use data-llm attribute for widget-to-model synchronization to keep the model aware of UI state
Prefer skybridge/server's registerWidget over raw MCP tool registration for better type inference
Use the local dev environment with HMR for faster development iterations
